ticket.title: rails runner --help documentation is off
ticket.original-body: rails runner --help list the following as the shebang format to run a script: @@@ #!/usr/bin/env /my_path_to_where_the_app_is/rails @@@ where, at least on OS X 10.6.4, the following is required: @@@ #!/usr/bin/env /my_path_to_where_the_app_is/rails runner @@@ Edited by [Rohit Arondekar](https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/users/89656) for formating.
ticket.latest-body: rails runner --help list the following as the shebang format to run a script: @@@ #!/usr/bin/env /my_path_to_where_the_app_is/rails @@@ where, at least on OS X 10.6.4, the following is required: @@@ #!/usr/bin/env /my_path_to_where_the_app_is/rails runner @@@ Edited by [Rohit Arondekar](https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/users/89656) for formating.
ticket.original-body-html:
rails runner --help

list the following as the shebang format to run a script:

#!/usr/bin/env /my_path_to_where_the_app_is/rails

where, at least on OS X 10.6.4, the following is required:

#!/usr/bin/env /my_path_to_where_the_app_is/rails runner

Edited by Rohit Arondekar for formating.

where, at least on OS X 10.6.4, the following is required:
